about_the_game: A fun and easy to play word puzzle game playable in six different languages: English, French, German, Italian, Portuguese and Spanish. Find words hidden within the honeycomb of letters. Words are selected with a simple click-drag-and-release gesture. Just give it a try for free. Neven is tremendously addictive and challenging. Enjoy endless hours of entertainment while improving your vocabulary to the beat of awesome music. Customize by selecting your playing level, font and language, and compare your score on baKno’s Top Players list.
detailed_description: A fun and easy to play word puzzle game playable in six different languages: English, French, German, Italian, Portuguese and Spanish. Find words hidden within the honeycomb of letters. Words are selected with a simple click-drag-and-release gesture. Just give it a try for free. Neven is tremendously addictive and challenging. Enjoy endless hours of entertainment while improving your vocabulary to the beat of awesome music. Customize by selecting your playing level, font and language, and compare your score on baKno’s Top Players list.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 10.10
  • Processor: Intel Single Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2004 GPU
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 10.12
  • Processor: Intel Multi Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2010 GPU
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

short_description: A fun and easy to play word puzzle game playable in six different languages: English, French, German, Italian, Portuguese and Spanish.
